contest-event.event-date: Nov. 3, 1979 D National Mineworkers (Championship Section) National Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-championship-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Championship Own Choice Test Piece Contest Winter Gardens, Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 16 bands competed.
